Authors:
Wayne M. Patrick, Matteo P Ferla, J. Cameron Thrash,
Stephen J. Giovannoni
Title:
New rRNA gene-based phylogenies of the Alphaproteobacteria
provide perspective on major groups, mitochondrial ancestry and
phylogenetic instability
Keywords:
Alphaproteobacteria, phylogenetics, rRNA genes, SAR11,
mitochondria
Abstract:
composite clade is a sister group to the abundant marine
SAR11 clade (Pelagibacterales). Furthermore, we add support for
taxonomic assignment of several recently sequenced taxa. Accordingly, we
propose three subclasses within the Alphaproteobacteria: the
Caulobacteridae, the Rickettsidae, and the Magnetococcidae.
